selectdropdown.text: Select dropdown for number of cards

kpi.name: ./addKPISectionC

selectdropdown.text: Select dropdown for number of cards

divider.fieldDescription: Select the checkbox to add divider line
divider.name: ./addDivider

bannerbar.fieldDescription: Select the checkbox to add Banner Bar
bannerbar.name: ./addBannerBar

description.fieldDescription: Richtext editor for adding Hero Banner Description Text
description.name: ./description

bgimage.fieldDescription: Background Image not required for Banner D
bgimage.name: ./backgroundImage

desktopimage.fieldDescription: Please add Desktop SVG Background image here.
desktopimage.name: ./filesvg
desktopimage.title: SVG Image Field

altText.fieldDescription: Textual alternative of the meaning or function of the image, for visually impaired readers.
altText.name: ./imgAltText

alt.fieldDescription: Textual alternative of the meaning or function of the image, for visually impaired readers.
alt.name: ./altText

tabletimage.fieldDescription: Please add Tablet Background image here.
tabletimage.name: ./tabletFile
tabletimage.title: Hero Banner Background Image

moblieimage.fieldDescription: Please add mobile background image here.
moblieimage.name: ./mobileFile
moblieimage.title: Logo

imagepreset.fieldDescription: Image Preset to use when rendering image. It cannot be set when viewer preset is set.
imagepreset.name: ./s7ImagePreset

viewerpreset.fieldDescription: Viewer Preset to use when rendering dynamic asset. For images, it cannot be set when image preset is set.
viewerpreset.name: ./s7ViewerPreset

urlModifiers.fieldDescription: Additional S7 image commands separated by '&'.Field gives complete flexibility to change image effects.
urlModifiers.name: ./urlModifiers

viewermodifiers.fieldDescription: Extra Viewer Modifiers as name=value pair with & delimiter ( i.e. posterimage=img.jpg&caption=txt.vtt,1 )
viewermodifiers.name: ./viewermodfiers

disableResponsive.fieldDescription: Disable responsive breakpoints. Fixed width image can be defined in Image Presets
disableResponsive.name: ./disableBreakpoints
